DOC.brief_title: A Study Determine Immunogenicity Safety Profile CSL Limited 's Influenza Virus Vaccine Compared US Licensed Comparator Influenza Virus Vaccine Pediatric Population
DOC.criteria: Healthy male nonpregnant female participant age ≥ 6 calendar month < 18 year time first study vaccination . For participant age ≥ 6 month < 9 year , bear normal gestation period ( 36 42 week ) . Females childbearing potential ( i.e. , ovulate , premenopausal , surgically sterile ) must abstinent willing use medically accept contraceptive regimen least 2 month vaccination . Females age ≥ 9 year must also return negative urine pregnancy test enrollment . Known hypersensitivity previous dose influenza vaccine allergy egg , chicken protein , neomycin , polymyxin , component Study Vaccine .
